property.name: Text
property.value: If your Demolisher, Devoted Decepticon would take non-attack damage from an opponent's card and is upgraded with an Armor -> Instead he takes that much damage minus 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: While there are no untapped enemy characters -> Each of your non-Titan characters has Pierce 3. When your Metroplex, Autobot City defends and you flip at least [W][O][U] -> Repair 1 damage from him. He can't take more attack damage this battle than the number of Stars the attacker has.

property.name: Text
property.value: When one of your characters defends and you have Autobot Jazz, Special Ops on the battlefield -> Any [B] battle icons flipped this battle become [W] battle icons instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your Autobots' Armors and Utilities can't be scrapped by your opponent's cards while you have Jetfire, Air Guardian on the battlefield. At the end of your turn -> You may move an Upgrade from your Jetfire, Air Guardian to one of your other characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: When your Wheeljack, Weapons Inventor attacks while upgraded with a Utility -> Flip him to another mode after this battle. If you began the game with only Autobots -> This gains '[TAP] -> Draw 2 cards. Then scrap 2 cards from your hand. You may play an Armor or Utility. Flip this.'

property.name: Text
property.value: When your Wheeljack, Weapons Inventor attacks while upgraded with a Utility -> Flip him to another mode after this battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: While your Inferno, Fearless Fighter is in bot mode -> He has Brave. When your Inferno, Fearless Fighter defends in bot mode and you flip at least [W][U] -> Flip him to alt mode.

property.name: Text
property.value: When your Bumblebee, Legendary Warrior is tapped and takes attack damage -> Repair 3 damage from him and untap him. Flip this.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip Dino-Chomp! while one of your Dinobots is attacking -> It gets +1 ATK until end of turn. When you flip either Jaws of Steel or Electrified Spikes while one of your Dinobots is defending -> It gets +1 DEF until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your Darkmount, Cruel Overlord is a Leader in both modes. When you put an Armor on your Darkmount, Cruel Overlord -> Repair 1 damage from him.

property.name: Text
property.value: Weapons on your Megatron, Living Weapon can't be scrapped by your opponent's cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your starting Star limit increases by 1 if you have only Dinobots on your starting team. Your Dinobots have +2 HP. When one of your Dinobots takes non-attack damage during your opponent's turn and you have Dinobot Sludge, Mighty Stomper on the battlefield -> Repair 1 from it.
